author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Puducherry chapter of the Indian Institute of Public Administration (IIPA) has a new set of office-bearers to guide the unit for the next four years.

A general body meeting of the IIPA unit here elected R.R. Dhanapall, former members, executive council, IIPA, New Delhi, as chairman.

A. Asokan, president, District Consumer Disputes Redressal Forum and Dr. K.V. Raman, Director of Health, were elected to the post of vice-chairman.

The general body also elected R. Narasimmamurthi, former PWD engineer, as honorary secretary and D. Jayavijayan as joint secretary.
title: IIPA’s Puducherry unit reconstituted
